1750-1758: The Dalai Lama takes control for Tibet

Back to Index

3825. The Dalai Lama takes control

Tibet — Not random

Conditions

  • Monarch Kezang Gyatso is active

Will happen within 10 days of November 12, 1750
Checked again every 10 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 1, 1758)

Description

After years of misrule by weak Kings who were puppets of foreign powers, the Dalai Lama, long the spiritual leader of the Tibetan people, has taken full control of the government. His Holiness, the Dalai Lama, seeks our advice. What kind of foreign policy should we pursue?

Actions

A. Turn inward and create a peaceful Shangri-La

  • Innovativeness -3
  • Centralization +1
  • Land tech investment: -200
  • Trade tech investment: -200
  • +50 relations with China
  • +50 relations with Chagatai

B. Chastise our treacherous neighbors!

  • Innovativeness +2
  • Centralization -1
  • Land tech investment: +400
  • Trade tech investment: +400
  • -50 relations with China
  • -50 relations with Chagatai
